contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of June, 2015, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, and the order of the Commonwealth Court is VACATED. See Commonwealth v. Allen, 630 Pa. 577, 107 A.3d 709 (2014). The matter is REMANDED for consideration of Respondent’s remaining appellate issues.
